articles.description: Brandon Better scored 13 points to lead Southern Utah to a 63-54 victory over Northern Arizona on Saturday.
articles.headline: Southern Utah beats cold-shooting Northern Arizona 63-54

articles.description: Marcus Derrickson scored 22 points, grabbed a career-best 18 rebounds and hit the game-winning 3-pointer on Saturday as Georgetown beat Seton Hall 83-80.
articles.headline: Georgetown beats Seton Hall after giving away 17-point lead

images.caption: Georgetown's Marcus Derrickson drills a 3-pointer with four seconds left in regulation to beat Seton Hall 83-80.
images.name: Hoyas hold off Pirates' last-second effort

articles.description: Bryce Canda hit his fourth 3-pointer of the game with 20 seconds left, giving Portland State an 80-77 victory over Montana State on Saturday.
articles.headline: Canda's 3-pointer lifts Portland State past Montana State

articles.description: TJ Haws scored 26 points with seven assists, Yoeli Childs had 20 points and nine rebounds and BYU beat San Francisco 75-73 in overtime on Saturday.
articles.headline: Haws hits winning FTs, BYU beats San Francisco 75-73 in OT

articles.description: Rodrick Sikes soared into the record books with 32 points to lead South Alabama to an 87-67 Sun Belt Conference win over Arkansas State on Saturday afternoon.
articles.headline: Sikes has 32 points, leads South Alabama to 87-67 win

articles.description: John Davis scored 13 points, Daniel Fowler had 12 and Furman defeated Wofford 76-52 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Furman has big runs to dump Wofford 76-52
